title: Miley Cyrus dishes out burning response to troll for criticising her fast-moving love life
text:

Miley Cyrus doesn't mince her words.

And The Wrecking Ball hitmaker didn't hold back when she served up a vicious response to a troll on Instagram on Tuesday.

The songstress, 26, come under fire from keyboard warriors for using the "same filter" on all of her photos with her current boyfriend and history of exes.

A troll mocked up a collage including photos of Miley when she was with her exes Liam Hemsworth and Kaitlynn Carter.

The critic then compared those throwback pictures to her latest snap with her new love Cody Simpson.

(Image: Instagram)

Trolls had no qualms pointing out the singer's liking for the black and white filter on Instagram.

"Same filter," the person wrote.

Miley couldn't resist biting back with a sarcastic comment attacking her love life.

She penned: "Classic."

The American songwriter's love life has been under scrutiny after she separated from her husband of eight months in recent months.

(Image: Instagram)

Miley announced she had separated from Liam when steamy snaps emerged of her locking lips with Kaitlynn on a boat during their holiday in Lake Como.

Their relationship wasn't made to last as it broke down after just six weeks of romance.

In that time, the couple made their red carpet debut at the VMAs and enjoyed a romantic break in Lake Como.

Miley has already been fixing her heartbreak with her new boyfriend Cody.

The pair go way back as they first crossed paths in 2014 and their friendship has flourished over the years.

They didn't wait long to make their romance Instagram official after they were spotted sharing a smooch in a grocery store in recent weeks.
description: The songstress come under fire from keyboard warriors for using the "same filter" on all of her photos with her exes
